Very nice game. If you are looking for a game that has 0 i mean 0, NULL, NONE, ZERO cheaters, then this is your game. It has a very colorful playerbase from all over the World. Like Turkey, Kyrgyzstan and also the mighty Russian Federation. The community members are very respectful towards each other and also kind and patient. You will never meet a toxic player on matchmaking.
I highly recommend this game.

Yours faithfully,
